column4: actionParsnip:: I guess that's my question then. do I have to do a full reinstall or can I just upgrade from a different repository?
L3top:: ok, def appreciate the advice.
mixing distros - is crazyness.  you can't "upgrade" to wheezy, it's a VERY different system.  ubuntu != debian, and debian != ubuntu.
sorry, i have no idea.  i haven't used xscreensaver is quite some time.  best of luck.
